name: K.P. Yohannan Books
description:
K.P. Yohannan ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker K.P. Yohannan in mp3 format. K.P. Yohannan is the founder of the Gospel For Asia organization and the leading bishop of the Believers Church movement in India. Currently there are over thousands of active labourers in the Gospel with over 2 million disciples in their churches. This movement is one of the wonderful works of God reaching the lost in the 10/40 window. 

Brother K.P. has written many books including: "Revolution In World Missions" with over 1 million copies distributed. Also another powerful book is: "Learning Godliness Through Submission" and the "Road To Reality." He has a great burden to see authentic Christianity lived out world-wide and calls us to fuller surrender to Jesus Christ and to learn godly discipline from the Scriptures and the early church fathers.
